title: Make a Class Action
description: Continue building a the test class by adding an action to the TestClass in the actionClass.quorum tab. This action will be named Test and output the message "This is a message from the TestClass action, Test."
answer: This is a message from Main.
hint: Drag over the action block and name the action Test. This action has no parameters or return value. Then add the output block to the Test action and change the output to "This is a message from the TestClass action, Test." In the next problem, you will use the class you have created.
